title.en: Respiratory Engine of the Emerald Deep

description.ko: 자연의 건축미와 생물 발광 에너지를 결합하여 천상의 호흡기 시스템을 통해 유기적 생명체를 탐구한 작품입니다.
description.en: An exploration of organic life through the lens of a celestial respiratory system, blending nature's architecture with bioluminescent energy.

prompt: A microscopic cinematic exploration of a pulsating organic lung-engine, built from translucent #7FB069 emerald membranes and thick #2D5A3D vascular roots. The structure inhales #E6F2E1 bioluminescent spores and exhales rhythmic #FFE66D liquid light. Suspended in a deep-sea atmospheric void, soft subsurface scattering creates a living internal glow. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, Octane Render, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics of the breathing light of nature.
